ability.FastStart.description: For the first 3 rounds after the PokÃ©mon enters the field, its attack and speed increase by 50%, and the effect ends after 3 rounds.
pixelmon.abilities.faststart: %s has entered the Fast Start state! Speed and attack have been greatly increased!
pixelmon.abilities.faststartend: The Fast Start effect of %s has ended! Speed and attack have returned to normal.
